languages.text: Загадочное устройство, подаренное леди Сюэ. Оно значительно усиливает мыслительные способности, если владелец сможет перетерпеть боль, сопровождающую подключение к механизму.

traits.locale_text: Загадочное устройство, подаренное леди Сюэ. Оно значительно усиливает мыслительные способности, если владелец сможет перетерпеть боль, сопровождающую подключение к механизму.

languages.text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.
languages.original_text: Загадочное устройство, подаренное леди Сюэ. Оно значительно усиливает мыслительные способности, если владелец сможет перетерпеть боль, сопровождающую подключение к механизму.

traits.locale_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.
This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.
This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.
This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

languages.text: Bu gizemli cihaz, Leydi Xue'dan bir hediye. Mekanizmaya bağlanmanın getirdiği acıya dayanabildiği sürece sahibinin bilişsel yeteneklerini önemli ölçüde geliştirme becerisine sahip.
languages.original_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

traits.locale_text: Bu gizemli cihaz, Leydi Xue'dan bir hediye. Mekanizmaya bağlanmanın getirdiği acıya dayanabildiği sürece sahibinin bilişsel yeteneklerini önemli ölçüde geliştirme becerisine sahip.

languages.text: Offert par dame Xue, cet appareil mystérieux amplifie considérablement les capacités cognitives de son utilisateur, tant que celui-ci peut supporter la douleur provoquée par la connexion au mécanisme.
languages.original_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

traits.locale_text: Offert par dame Xue, cet appareil mystérieux amplifie considérablement les capacités cognitives de son utilisateur, tant que celui-ci peut supporter la douleur provoquée par la connexion au mécanisme.

languages.text: この謎めいた装置はレディ・シュエからの贈り物だ。所有者の認知能力を大幅に高めるが、機械と接続する際に痛みに耐えなければならない。
languages.original_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

traits.locale_text: この謎めいた装置はレディ・シュエからの贈り物だ。所有者の認知能力を大幅に高めるが、機械と接続する際に痛みに耐えなければならない。

languages.text: 这件神秘的装置是薛女士送来的礼物。它可以有效强化使用者的认知能力，但前提是，使用者能忍受机器带来的痛苦。
languages.original_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

traits.locale_text: 这件神秘的装置是薛女士送来的礼物。它可以有效强化使用者的认知能力，但前提是，使用者能忍受机器带来的痛苦。

languages.text: Este misterioso dispositivo es regalo de lady Xue. Refuerza las capacidades cognitivas del portador, siempre que pueda resistir el dolor que causa la conexión.
languages.original_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

traits.locale_text: Este misterioso dispositivo es regalo de lady Xue. Refuerza las capacidades cognitivas del portador, siempre que pueda resistir el dolor que causa la conexión.

languages.text: Das geheimnisvolle Gerät ist ein Geschenk von Lady Xue. Es erweitert die kognitiven Fähigkeiten seines Trägers beträchtlich, solange er die mit dem Mechanismus verknüpften Schmerzen erträgt.
languages.original_text: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

traits.locale_text: Das geheimnisvolle Gerät ist ein Geschenk von Lady Xue. Es erweitert die kognitiven Fähigkeiten seines Trägers beträchtlich, solange er die mit dem Mechanismus verknüpften Schmerzen erträgt.
